front.title: How Did We Get Into This Mess?
front.gametext: If one of your droids is at the Dune Sea or where there is a Scomp link, use 1 Force to discard your entire hand to your Used Pile. Draw the same number of cards from your Reserve Deck. Draw one extra card if droid is C- 3PO or R2-D2.
front.lore: Stranded in the Dune Sea, R2-D2 insisted on heading into rocky canyons where he thought settlements were likely to exist. Threepio had other ideas.

canceledBy: Shut Him Up Or Shut Him Down
